statements: DELETE FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 5000 AND engagement_rate >= 3.5;
DELETE FROM influencer_profiles WHERE id = 1 AND category = 'Fashion';
DELETE FROM engagement_metrics WHERE influencer_id = 3 AND shares > 100;
DELETE FROM influencers WHERE id = 1 AND followers_count < 5000;
DELETE FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE influencer_id = 100 AND status = 'active';
DELETE FROM engagement_metrics WHERE metric_id = 500 OR (likes > 1000 AND shares < 500);
DELETE FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_id = 1001 AND followers_count < 5000;
DELETE FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 2002 AND influencer_id IN (SELECT influencer_id FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate < 0.05);
